item.title: Neues Format: Coding im Dojo
item.description: To get the new year off to a good start, the first Coding im Dojo of the year took place on January 15. As with every Coding im Dojo, the focus is on making and creativity. All participants can come to us with their own topics and the mentors will endeavor to support your projects in word and deed and help you develop and tinker ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ«. The children were able to take part in this â€œCoding in the Dojoâ€ either on site or online via BigBlue-Button.
